001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.client;
002
003import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.LinkHandler;
004import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.MessageHandler;
005import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance;
006import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.Challenge;
007import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.exception.DidException;
008import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
009import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.ClaimReference;
010import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Request;
011import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Share;
012import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.regions.PingOneRegion;
013
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.UUID;
016
017public class DidMessageHandler implements MessageHandler, LinkHandler {
018
019    private ApplicationInstance applicationInstance;
020    private PingOneRegion region;
021    private DidMessageListener didMessageListener;
022
023    public DidMessageHandler(ApplicationInstance applicationInstance, PingOneRegion region, DidMessageListener didMessageListener) {
024        this.applicationInstance = applicationInstance;
025        this.region = region;
026        this.didMessageListener = didMessageListener;
027    }
028
029    @Override
030    public void handleShare(UUID uuid, String s, Challenge challenge, List<Share> list, List<DidException> list1) {
031        didMessageListener.handleShare(uuid, s, challenge, list, list1, applicationInstance);
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public void handleShareRequest(UUID uuid, String s, Challenge challenge, List<String> list) {
036        didMessageListener.handleShareRequest(uuid, s, challenge, list, applicationInstance);
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public void handleClaim(UUID uuid, String s, Challenge challenge, Claim claim, List<DidException> list) {
041        didMessageListener.handleClaim(uuid, s, challenge, claim, list, applicationInstance);
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    public void handleExpiredClaim(UUID uuid, String s, Challenge challenge, ClaimReference claimReference, List<DidException> list) {
046        didMessageListener.handleExpiredClaim(uuid, s, challenge, claimReference, list, applicationInstance);
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public void handleRequest(Request request) {
051        didMessageListener.handleRequest(request, applicationInstance);
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public void handleSecureMessage(UUID senderId, String message, Challenge challenge) {
056        didMessageListener.handleSecureMessage(senderId, message, challenge, applicationInstance);
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public void handleException(DidException e) {
061        didMessageListener.handleException(e, applicationInstance);
062    }
063}
